text: Ee Nadu Innale Vaare is a 2001 Indian Malayalam film, directed by I. V. Sasi, written by K. S. Noushad, starring Lal and Vani Viswanath. ==Cast== *Lal as Plappalli Sreedharan *Kalabhavan Mani as Seythu *Vani Viswanath as Beena Benachamin IPS *Sindhu Menon as T. K. Sreeja *N. F. Varghese as Ambalakkadan Gowridas *Narendra Prasad as Ambalakkadan Vishwambharan *Rajan P. Dev as *Bheeman Raghu as Aana Kasim *Babu Namboothiri as Trikottor Vaidair *Spadikam George as CI Edappally Surendran *Cochin Haneefa as Chandrakumaran *Madhupal as T. K. Vijayan *Subair as Kuryakose * Kaviyoor Renuka as Savitri * Kochu Preman as Divakaran *Jose Pellissery as Parameswaran *Salim Kumar *Kollam Ajith as Pappy *Abu Salim *Pradeep Kottayam *C. T. Ismail ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by I. V. Sasi
title: Ee Naadu Innale Vare
